body_html:
Similarly with torchvision use this
$ sudo pip3 install torchvision
Output:

Collecting torchvision
Downloading torchvision-0.1.9-py2.py3-none-any.whl (43kB)
100% |████████████████████████████████| 51kB 517kB/s
Requirement already satisfied: six in ./.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in ./.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: torch in /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pillow in /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages (from torch->torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: olefile in /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages (from pillow->torchvision)
Installing collected packages: torchvision
Successfully installed torchvision-0.1.9

body:
Similarly with torchvision use this
``
$ sudo pip3 install torchvision
``
Output:
>Collecting torchvision
  Downloading torchvision-0.1.9-py2.py3-none-any.whl (43kB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 51kB 517kB/s 
Requirement already satisfied: six in ./.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from torchvision)

Requirement already satisfied: torch in /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages (from torchvision)
